questions.question: What is the dominant color of the displayed item?
Considering the overall form, what is the primary shape of the object?
What seems to be the primary material used in the product's construction?
Describing the surface, what kind of texture does the item exhibit?
Observing the item's surface, what pattern is visible on it?
Focusing on the edges, what is the character of the item's perimeter?
Analyzing the visual features, is the object opaque or translucent?
Considering its design, what is the intended function of this item?
Regarding its flexibility, is the item rigid, flexible or neither?
Judging by its appearance, is the object single-layered or multi-layered?
What is the apparent thickness of the presented item?
In terms of its finish, is the object matte, glossy or semi-gloss?
Is there any noticeable print or logo on the item's surface?
Based on appearance, is the item sealed or open at its edges?
What is the apparent overall condition of the presented item?
